algorithm_technique: Greedy approach with sorting arrival times
problem_summary_simple: Eliminate as many monsters as possible before any reach the city.
problem_summary_technical: Calculate arrival times for each monster and greedily eliminate them in increasing order of arrival time.
key_insights: The critical factor is the time it takes for each monster to reach the city.
Calculate arrival time as `(distance - 1) / speed` (integer division for time units).
Sort these arrival times and eliminate monsters in that order. If a monster arrives at or before the current minute, you lose.
